name: JobService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Job Service

scripts.deploy-development-local: ./node_modules/node-lambda/bin/node-lambda deploy -e development -f config/development.env -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067 -P nypl-sandbox
scripts.deploy-production-local: ./node_modules/node-lambda/bin/node-lambda deploy -e production -f config/production.env -o 'arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access' -b subnet-5deecd15,subnet-59bcdd03 -g sg-116eeb60 -P nypl-digital-dev
